This is what climate change looks like.

The GOP like to mock scientific warnings about climate change as exaggeration. But just look around: it’s already starting.

We have 10 years to cut carbon emissions in half. Updates on the #GettyFire:

All schools in Santa Monica and Malibu are now closed as well as several campuses in LAUSD.

If you are under mandatory evacuation orders, leave now. Shelters are available including for those with animals. https://twitter.com/MayorOfLA/status/1188815508046397442 QT @MayorOfLA Current shelters for people evacuating due to the #GettyFire.
